functions.name: createAndPositionElement
functions.description: Creates a tab context menu item.

parameters.name: aTag
parameters.description: The tag of the element.

parameters.name: aAttrs
parameters.description: The attributes of the element.

id.description: The id of the element being created.

class.description: The class of the element being created.

accesskey.description: The access key for the element.

oncommand.description: The name of the function to execute oncommand.

onclick.description: The name of the function to execute when the created element is clicked.

label.description: The label of the element being created.

modifiers.description: The modifiers for the activation key.

hidden.description: The visibility status of the element.

preference.description: The preference that controls visibility of the element.

parameters.name: aAdjacentTo
parameters.description: The id of the element that will be used to position the new element.

parameters.name: aPosition
parameters.description: The position relative to the target element. If no position is given the new element will be appeneded.

parameters.name: aContent
parameters.description: True if elements should be created in window content document rather than window document.

functions.name: createElementAs
functions.description: Get the specified attribute from the given element id.

parameters.name: aTag
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

parameters.name: aAttrs
parameters.description: The attributes of the element.

id.description: The id of the element being created.

customizable.description: Whether the element is customizable or not.

flex.description: Is the element a flex container.

parameters.name: aSetAs
parameters.description: String identifier to determine what to set the created element as.

functions.name: elementExistsInContent
functions.description: Attempt to retrieve the given element Id from the current content document.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

functions.name: getElementAttr
functions.description: Get the specified attribute from the given element id.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

parameters.name: aAttr
parameters.description: The attribute of the element to retrieve.

functions.name: setAttributes
functions.description: Set the specified attributes for the given element id.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

parameters.name: aAttrs
parameters.description: The attributes of the element to set.

class.description: The class attribute to add to the element.

preference.description: The preference that controls the elements action/visibility.

functions.name: registerPref
functions.description: Register the given preference with the default branch.

parameters.name: aName
parameters.description: The name of the preferences being registered.

parameters.name: aValue
parameters.description: The value of the preferences being registered.

functions.name: addPreference
functions.description: Add preferences to the Preferences object in the window content.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: Preference id.

parameters.name: aType
parameters.description: Preference type.

functions.name: isTopWindowPrivate
functions.description: Returns bool val of top window privacy state.

functions.name: getContainer
functions.description: Get the container with name aName.

parameters.name: aName
parameters.description: The name of the container to retrieve.

functions.name: addElementListener
functions.description: Add an event listener to the given element for the given event type.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The Id of the element to add a listener to.

parameters.name: aEvent
parameters.description: The event to listen for.

parameters.name: aSubject
parameters.description: The subject used to determine function.

functions.name: windowIsChromeWindow
functions.description: Returns whether the current window is a ChromeWindow

functions.name: getPlatform
functions.description: Returns the current platform.

functions.name: append
functions.description: Append text to given element.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

parameters.name: aText
parameters.description: The text to append.

functions.name: initialized
functions.description: Returns a boolean indicating if aId is initialized in the current window.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the object to search for in the current top window.

functions.name: registerStatusBar
functions.description: Register StatusBar.jsm with the current top window.

functions.name: configureStatusBar
functions.description: Configure the status bar.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

functions.name: configureResizer
functions.description: Configure the resizer.

functions.name: overrideStatusPanelLabel
functions.description: Override StatusPanel.label.

functions.name: configureBottomBox
functions.description: Configure the bottom box.

functions.name: registerPrivateTab
functions.description: Register PrivateTab.jsm with the current top window.

parameters.name: aName
parameters.description: The name of the container to retrieve.

parameters.name: aAttrs
parameters.description: The attributes of the custom private tab widget.

id.description: The id of the element being created.

class.description: The class of the element being created.

oncommand.description: The name of the function to execute oncommand.

label.description: The label of the element being created.

functions.name: updatePrivateMaskId
functions.description: Updates the private-browsing-indicator id.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The updated id value.

functions.name: initPrivateTabListeners
functions.description: Initialize ancillary privateTab listeners.

functions.name: initCustomFunctions
functions.description: Initialize custom functions.

functions.name: registerTabFeatures
functions.description: Register TabFeatures.jsm with the current top window.

functions.name: setStyle
functions.description: Set additional css rules for about:preferences.
